text: Malherbe-sur-Ajon is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Banneville-sur-Ajon (the seat) and Saint-Agnan-le-Malherbe.Arrêté préfectoral 9 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Malherbe-sur-Ajon
